description: Returns the full details of a channel in an Amazon Chime AppInstance.

parameters.name: ChimeBearer
parameters.description: The ARN of the AppInstanceUser or AppInstanceBot that makes the API call.

nested_items.name: CreatedBy
nested_items.description: The AppInstanceUser who created the channel.

nested_items.name: CreatedTimestamp
nested_items.description: The time at which the AppInstanceUser created the channel.

nested_items.name: LastMessageTimestamp
nested_items.description: The time at which a member sent the last message in the channel.

nested_items.name: LastUpdatedTimestamp
nested_items.description: The time at which a channel was last updated.

nested_items.name: ChannelFlowArn
nested_items.description: The ARN of the channel flow.

nested_items.name: ElasticChannelConfiguration
nested_items.description: The attributes required to configure and create an elastic channel. An elastic channel can support a maximum of 1-million members.

nested_items.name: MaximumSubChannels
nested_items.description: The maximum number of SubChannels that you want to allow in the elastic channel.

nested_items.name: TargetMembershipsPerSubChannel
nested_items.description: The maximum number of members allowed in a SubChannel.

nested_items.name: MinimumMembershipPercentage
nested_items.description: The minimum allowed percentage of TargetMembershipsPerSubChannel users. Ceil of the calculated value is used in balancing members among SubChannels of the elastic channel.

nested_items.name: ExpirationSettings
nested_items.description: Settings that control when a channel expires.

nested_items.name: ExpirationDays
nested_items.description: The period in days after which the system automatically deletes a channel.

nested_items.name: ExpirationCriterion
nested_items.description: The conditions that must be met for a channel to expire.
